00643 class command_line_parameters_parser : boost::noncopyable {
00644     typedef detail::common_checker< parameters, detail::parameter_parts_extractor, std::string > checker;
00645     typedef boost::ptr_vector< checker >    common_checkers;
00646     typedef common_checkers::iterator       checker_it;
00647     typedef common_checkers::const_iterator checker_const_it;
00648 public:
00649     command_line_parameters_parser() : 
00650             name_value_separator( "=" ) {} 
00651 public:
00652     parameter& add_parameter( const std::string& short_name
00653                              , const std::string& full_name
00654                              , void ( *fn )() ) {
00655         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, fn );
00656     }

00660                              , const std::string& full_name
00661                              , void ( *fn )( const ArgType& ) ) {
00662         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, fn );
00663     }

00667                              , const std::string& full_name
00668                              , void ( *fn )( ArgType ) ) {
00669         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, fn );
00670     }

00673                               , void ( *fn )() ) {
00674         return create_parameter( single_name, "", fn );
00675     }

00692                              , ObjectType* obj

00694         return create_parameter( short_name, full_name, obj, fn );

00800     template
00801     < 
00802         typename ObjectType
00803         , typename ArgType
00804     > 
00805     parameter& add_parameter( const std::string& single_name
00806                              , ObjectType* obj
00807                              , void ( ObjectType::*fn )( ArgType ) const ) {  
00808         return create_parameter( single_name, "", obj, fn );
00809     }
00810 private:
00811     parameters registered_parameters;
00812 private:
00813     template< typename PtrToFun >
00814     parameter& create_parameter( const std::string&  short_name
00815                                 , const std::string& full_name
00816                                 , const PtrToFun&    ptr_to_fun ) { 
00817         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_fun, short_name );
00818         check_names_validity( short_name, full_name );
00819 
00820         registered_parameters += parameter( short_name, full_name, ptr_to_fun );
00821         return registered_parameters.back();
00822     }
00823 
00824     template
00825     < 
00826         typename PtrToObj
00827         , typename PtrToObjFun
00828     >
00829     parameter& create_parameter( const std::string&  short_name
00830                                 , const std::string& full_name
00831                                 , const PtrToObj&    ptr_to_obj
00832                                 , const PtrToObjFun& ptr_to_fun ) {
00833         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_obj, short_name );
00834         check_null_ptr( ptr_to_fun, short_name );
00835         check_names_validity( short_name, full_name );
00836         
00837         registered_parameters += parameter( short_name, full_name, ptr_to_obj, ptr_to_fun );
00838         return registered_parameters.back();
00839     }
00840 private:
00841     template< typename Ptr >
00842     void check_null_ptr( const Ptr& ptr, const std::string& parameter_name ) const {
00843         if ( 0 == ptr ) {
00844             const std::string what_happened =
00845                 "Zero pointer (function/object/method) detected for parameter '" + parameter_name + "'!";
00846             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00847         } else {}
00848     }
00849 
00850     void check_names_validity( const std::string& short_name, const std::string& full_name ) const {
00851         check_spaces_existence_in( short_name );
00852         check_spaces_existence_in( full_name );
00853         check_equality_of( short_name, full_name );
00854         check_uniqueness_of( short_name );
00855         check_uniqueness_of( full_name );
00856     }
00857 
00858     void check_spaces_existence_in( const std::string& name ) const {
00859         if ( boost::contains( name, " " ) ) {
00860             const std::string what_happened = 
00861                     "Invalid parameter's name '" + name + "', it shouldn't contains space(s)!";
00862             throw std::runtime_error( what_happened );
00863         } else {}
00864     }
00865 
00866     void check_equality_of( const std::string& short_name, const std::string& full_name ) const {
00867         if ( short_name == full_name ) {
00868             const std::string what_happened = "Equal names of parameter: '"
00869                                               + short_name + "', '" + full_name + "'!";
00870             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00871         } else {}
00872     }
00873     
00874     void check_uniqueness_of( const std::string& name ) const {
00875         parameter_const_it it = std::find( registered_parameters.begin()
00876                                            , registered_parameters.end()
00877                                            , name );
00878         if ( registered_parameters.end() != it ) {
00879             const std::string what_happened = "Parameter with name '" + name + "' already exists!";
00880             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00881         } else {}
00882     } 
00883 private:
00884     std::string name_value_separator;
00885     common_checkers checkers;
00886     detail::parameter_parts_extractor_p extractor;
00887 public:
00888     void set_value_separator( char separator ) {
00889         check_printable_of( separator );
00890         name_value_separator = separator;
00891     }
00892 private:
00893     void check_printable_of( char separator ) const {
00894         const int ascii_code = separator;
00895         if ( ascii_code <= 0x20 ) {
00896             const std::string what_happened = "Symbol (ASCII-code is "
00897                                               + detail::to_str( separator )
00898                                               + ") is not suitable for name-value separator!";
00899             throw std::invalid_argument( what_happened );
00900         } else {}
00901     }
00902 public:
00903     void parse( int argc, char** argv ) {
00904         detail::str_storage inputed_parameters = obtain_parameters_from( argc, argv );
00905         if ( there_is_nothing_to_parse( inputed_parameters ) ) {
00906             return;
00907         } else {}
00908         
00909         create_parameter_parts_extractor();
00910         create_parameters_checkers();
00911         base_checks( inputed_parameters );
00912         handle_unnamed_parameters( inputed_parameters );
00913         remaining_checks( inputed_parameters );
00914         call_corresponding_user_functions( inputed_parameters );
00915     }
00916 private:
00917     detail::str_storage obtain_parameters_from( int argc, char** argv ) const {
00918         detail::str_storage inputed_parameters;
00919         for ( int i = 1; i < argc; ++i ) {
00920             inputed_parameters += argv[i];
00921         }
00922         return inputed_parameters;
00923     }
00924     
00925     bool there_is_nothing_to_parse( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) const {
00926         return inputed_parameters.empty() 
00927                && no_parameters_with_default_value()
00928                && no_necessary_parameters();
00929     }
00930 
00931     bool no_parameters_with_default_value() const {
00932         parameter_const_it it = std::find_if( registered_parameters.begin()
00933                                               , registered_parameters.end()
00934                                               , boost::mem_fn( &parameter::has_default_value ) );
00935         return registered_parameters.end() == it;
00936     }
00937 
00938     bool no_necessary_parameters() const {
00939         parameter_const_it it = std::find_if( registered_parameters.begin()
00940                                               , registered_parameters.end()
00941                                               , boost::mem_fn( &parameter::it_is_necessary ) );
00942         return registered_parameters.end() == it;
00943     }
00944     
00945     void handle_unnamed_parameters( detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00946         detail::unnamed_parameters_handler handle( registered_parameters
00947                                                    , *extractor
00948                                                    , name_value_separator );
00949         handle( inputed_parameters );
00950     }
00951 
00952     void create_parameter_parts_extractor() {
00953         extractor.reset( new detail::parameter_parts_extractor( name_value_separator ) );
00954     } 
00955 
00956     void create_parameters_checkers() {
00957         using namespace detail;
00958 
00959         checkers.push_back( 
00960                 new parameters_existence_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00961         checkers.push_back( 
00962                 new parameters_redundancy_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) ); 
00963         checkers.push_back( 
00964                 new parameters_repetition_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00965         checkers.push_back( 
00966                 new incorrect_parameters_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) ); 
00967         checkers.push_back( 
00968                 new necessary_parameters_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00969         checkers.push_back( 
00970                 new parameters_values_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00971         checkers.push_back( 
00972                 new values_semantic_checker( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator ) );
00973     }
00974     
00975     void base_checks( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00976         const size_t base_checkers_quantity = 3;
00977         for ( checker_const_it it = checkers.begin();
00978               checkers.begin() + base_checkers_quantity != it;
00979               ++it ) {
00980             it->check( inputed_parameters );
00981         }
00982         checkers.erase( checkers.begin(), checkers.begin() + base_checkers_quantity );
00983     }
00984     
00985     void remaining_checks( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00986         for ( checker_const_it it = checkers.begin(); checkers.end() != it; ++it ) {
00987             it->check( inputed_parameters );
00988         }
00989     }
00990 
00991     void call_corresponding_user_functions( const detail::str_storage& inputed_parameters ) {
00992         detail::user_functions_caller caller( registered_parameters, *extractor, name_value_separator );
00993         caller.call( inputed_parameters );
00994     }
00995 };
00996 
00998 typedef command_line_parameters_parser command_line_parameter_parser;
00999 
01000 } // namespace clpp
01001 
01003 namespace clp_parser = clpp;
